processedDockerfile:
FROM linuxbrew/linuxbrew
MAINTAINER Shaun Jackman <sjackman@gmail.com>
#   ENV PERL5LIB /home/linuxbrew/perl5/lib/perl5
#   RUN brew install cpanm
#   For edirect
#   RUN cpanm HTML::Entities LWP::Simple LWP::Protocol::https
RUN brew tap homebrew/science
RUN brew install perl python matplotlib numpy scipy
RUN brew install libxml2
RUN pip install biopython==1.81 pysam==0.21.0 python-igraph==0.10.4
RUN brew install a5 abacas abyss abyss-explorer ace-corrector adam afra allpaths-lg analysis andi arcs art artemis astral atram bam-readcount bamhash bamm bamtools bamutil barrnap bbtools bcalm bcftools beagle beast beast2 bedops bedtools beetl bfc bioawk biobloomtools biointerchange biomake blasr blast bowtie bowtie2 bpipe breseq busco bwa canu cap3 cd-hit celera-assembler centrifuge cerulean circlator clark clonalframeml clonehd clustal-omega clustal-w cytoscape daligner dazz_db dextractor diamond dida discovar dsk dwgsim e-mem exonerate express fasta fastml fastq-tools fastqc fasttree fastuniq fastx_toolkit fermi fermi-lite fermi2 fermikit flash freebayes freec fsa fwdpp gatb geneid gingr glimmerhmm grabix hisat hisat2 hlaminer hmmer hmmer2 htsbox htslib humann2 idba igv igvtools impute2 infernal iqtree jellyfish jellyfish-1.1 kaiju kallisto kat kent-tools kmacs kmc kmergenie kmerstream kollector last libbigwig libpll libsequence links-scaffolder lobstr lsd lumpy-sv macse mafft mapsembler2 maq mash mcl megahit mhap minced minia miniasm minimap mir-prefer mitofy mrbayes multi-worm-tracker mummer muscle nanopolish ncl newick-utils newicktools nextflow nonpareil novoalign ntcard nxtrim oases oma orthofinder paml pandaseq parsnp pathd8 pathvisio pear phipack phlawd phylip phyml phyx picard-tools piler pilercr pilon plink poa prodigal proteinortho psmc quast quest quorum racon rapsearch2 raxml rcorrector readseq readsim recon repeatmasker repeatmodeler repeatscout rmblast rna-star rnammer ropebwt2 sailfish salmon sambamba samblaster samtools samtools-0.1 scarpa sdsl-lite seqan seqtk sequel sga shrimp skewer smalt snap snoscan snp-sites snpeff soapdenovo spaced spades spici squeezambler sratoolkit ssake stringtie swarm tagdust tasr tbl2asn tophat trans-abyss transdecoder transrate-tools trf trimadap trimal trimmomatic trinity trnascan uproc vague varscan vcake vcflib vcftools velvet viennarna vsearch vt weblogo wiggletools yaha
#   RUN brew install adapterremoval
#   RUN brew install amos
#   RUN brew install anvio
#   RUN brew install augustus
#   RUN brew install biopieces
#   RUN brew install blat
#   RUN brew install bless
#   RUN brew install cegma
#   RUN brew install corset
#   RUN brew install delly
#   RUN brew install discovardenovo
#   RUN brew install edirect
#   RUN brew install ensembl-tools
#   RUN brew install gaemr
#   RUN brew install garli
#   RUN brew install gatk
#   RUN brew install genewise
#   RUN brew install genometools
#   RUN brew install gmap-gsnap
#   RUN brew install graphlan
#   RUN brew install gubbins
#   RUN brew install harvest-tools
#   RUN brew install iva
#   RUN brew install kraken
#   RUN brew install maker
#   RUN brew install masurca
#   RUN brew install meme
#   RUN brew install metaphlan
#   RUN brew install mira
#   RUN brew install mlst
#   RUN brew install mothur
#   RUN brew install ncbi-c++-toolkit
#   RUN brew install ogdraw
#   RUN brew install pbsuite
#   RUN brew install plink2
#   RUN brew install populations
#   RUN brew install poretools
#   RUN brew install prokka
#   RUN brew install quaff
#   RUN brew install quake
#   RUN brew install rampart
#   RUN brew install ray
#   RUN brew install reapr
#   RUN brew install simulate-pcr
#   RUN brew install smrtanalysis
#   RUN brew install snap-aligner
#   RUN brew install sortmerna
#   RUN brew install trans_proteomic_pipeline
#   RUN brew install ucsc-genome-browser
RUN groupadd --system docker-user ; useradd --system --gid docker-user docker-user
USER docker-user
# Please add your HEALTHCHECK here!!!

#  ENV PERL5LIB /home/linuxbrew/perl5/lib/perl5

RUN brew install perl python matplotlib numpy scipy

RUN pip install biopython pysam python-igraph
